items.headline: Robinhood finally gets a place in the S&P 500. These other stocks will join as well.
items.summary_en: AppLovin and Emcor were also tapped to join the benchmark index later this month, as MarketAxess, Caesars and Enphase get the boot.

items.headline: Kenvue fights back against RFK Jr.’s Tylenol safety concerns as its stock tumbles
items.summary_en: Kenvue rushed to the defense of Tylenol, but the stock still suffered a record selloff on news that RFK Jr. will release a report linking the use of acetaminophen during pregnancy to autism.

items.headline: How you can still get a refund for a delayed or canceled flight even as Trump scraps Biden’s airline compensation proposal
items.summary_en: The Trump administration this week said it will reverse plans to require airlines to compensate passengers for lengthy delays and cancellations, a move consumer advocates say is likely the first of many to weaken protections for travelers.

items.headline: OPEC+ meets this weekend at a precarious time for crude oil. Here’s what’s at stake.
items.summary_en: The market has a lot to contend with as OPEC+ considers a second round of production hikes this weekend, against an economic and geopolitical backdrop that’s dimmed prospects for demand and boosted the potential for a supply surplus this year and next.

items.headline: 10-year Treasury tumbles to early April low as weak jobs report raises chances of a half-point Fed rate cut
items.summary_en: Longer-term Treasury yields look like a safety play for the first time since April’s market shock.

items.headline: Why AMD’s stock just saw one of the worst drops in the S&P 500 on Friday

items.headline: Lululemon’s style refresh is met with Wall Street skepticism. ‘It’s going to get worse,’ analyst says.
items.summary_en: The retailer’s gym- and yoga-clothing revamp isn’t expected to take hold until the spring of 2026 or later — and its shares are on pace for their lowest close in over five years.
